events.name: Special July Meetup - CTF Experience Workshop
events.description: JOINTLY ORGANISED WITH (ISC)2 Singapore Chapter & Booz Allen Hamilton. VENUE SPONSORED BY FOUND. AIM OF THIS EVENT- Attendees to get their hands on CTF experiences- Announcement of Booz Allen Hamilton Kaizen CTF (to be held in Oct)- Introduce Booz Allen Hamilton Kaizen CTF Challenge Development Contest- Social & Network AGENDA- Introduction: Div0, (ISC)2 and Booz Allen Hamilton- About the Booz Allen Hamilton Kaizen CTF including demo of gameplay- Overview of CTF Challenge Development Contest- Challenge Development Walkthrough- CTF Experience & Challenge Development Workshop- Social & Network SPEAKERS BIOTRACY SALES is a Lead Associate at Booz Allen Hamilton, leading the cyber testing programme within the international market. Tracy has been with Booz Allen Hamilton for 9 years and has worked with a variety of clients across multiple industries; primarily designing and leading cyber assessment activities. JEFF HAMMETT is a Senior Consultant at Booz Allen Hamilton, where he leads the offensive-side of cyber testing within the international market. Prior to joining Booz Allen Hamilton he helped small businesses defend their networks and systems and was a frequent participant in CTF events. Both Tracy and Jeff has extensive experience hosting CTF competition; having led events on multiple continents for Booz Allen. In April of this year, their team partnered with the Saudi Arabian Federation for Cybersecurity and Programming to host "Kaizen Arabia", a national CTF for 300 participants which was broadcast on live TV. ABOUT OUR VENUE SPONSORFOUND. is a network of innovation studios where ambitious entrepreneurs and corporates find coaching, expertise, and partners to create future-ready solutions. Found. a community of over 2,500 members and alumni, and have supported more than 75 corporates in developing their innovation agendas. Found. also became Google for Entrepreneurs’ first Southeast Asian partner in 2017. For more information, visit www.found.us

events.name: The Power of Artificial Intelligence in Sales
events.description: Please register here, https://www.sginnovate.com/events/power-artificial-intelligence-sales The Power of Artificial Intelligence in Sales Presented by General Assembly. Partnered with SGInnovate Join GA for a talk on how to get actionable insights about how businesses benefit and grow by creating personalised experiences for their customers using data and machine learning. Come hear practical steps companies are using to transform from traditional sales to ones which leverage AI to improve the sales funnel. Date: 17 July 2018Time: 6:30pm- 8:15pmVenue: 32 Carpenter Street, Singapore 059911 Programme:6:30pm - 7:00pm: Check-in & Networking7:00pm - 7:45pm: Panel/Lighting Talks7:45pm - 8:15pm: Q&A and Networking Takeaways:- What is the role of AI and machine learning in sales?- How can businesses utilise AI for better customer experience and sales growth?- How to prepare your sales funnel for the AI revolution?

events.name: Mini-Coderetreat, Refactoring Kata
events.description: Target Audience: Software developers Code Retreat (http://coderetreat.org) is a day-long coding dojo where you enter a safe environment to try stuff out, make mistakes and learn with others. It’s a breathing space where the focus is not on delivering solutions, but rather on being aware of what you actually do when you produce code, and how to improve that process. [1] Since we don't have one full day, we miniaturized it and thus, Mini-CodeRetreat. The exercise is Tennis Refactoring Kata (https://github.com/emilybache/Tennis-Refactoring-Kata). It comes with code and test in various programming languages. The goal is to improve the code by removing code smells and apply design principles where it fits. ### Pre-requisitesYou're expected to code! =) Please study the code (check if it has your preferred language), bring your laptop with favourite development environment along with the code repository set up. If the test passed, it means you're ready for the session. Please bring your Identity Card along to exchange pass for entering the building. Registration is strictly closed by 12 July. ### AgendaWe'll do a maximum of 3 rounds of 25 mins each and switch pairs every round. Please be on time! 6:45pm - Drinks and snacks7:00pm - Short Introduction to Refactoring7:15pm - Round 17:40pm - Retrospective, break & switch pairs7:50pm - Round 28:15pm - Retrospective, break & switch pairs8:25pm - Round 38:50pm - Retrospective and closing [1] The Coding Dojo Handbook by Emily Bache https://leanpub.com/codingdojohandbook
events.location: Ministry of Manpower, 18 Havelock Road, 059764, Singapore

events.name: Crowd Commerce: Another changing trend in eCommerce
events.description:
We all know the retail shops are closing down, if they choose to ignore the current trend which everyone, every business is going digital. Cumulative data from Statista anticipates a 246.15% increase in worldwide ecommerce sales, from $1.3 trillion in 2014 to $4.5 trillion in 2021. That’s a nearly threefold lift in online revenue.
However, it is also a truth that the competition within eCommerce industry is fiercer than ever with big players like Amazon, eBay, TaoBao are conquering the market. In addition, setting up a online store is easy using platform such as Shopify, however, we will face challenges such as diffciulties in getting sales, recurring cost in running facebook ads, as well as the need of keep trying new products to sell online.
However, there is another trend of eCommerce, namely Crowd Commerce that will also allow you to expand globally and working 24/7 for you. What is more exciting is that it will help to solve all the problem that has been mentioned above.
Therefore, wait no more and sign up for the workshop! You have nothing to lost since it is a FREE admision and that is why LIMITED SEAT IS AVAILABLE!
'If you don't find a way to make money while you sleep, you will work until you die'- one of the famous quote from Warren Buffett
About the speaker:
Being an ex-real estate agent, Mr. Winston Yap had gone through the ups and downs in his career. From being an employee and subsequently owning training school business to having nothing. All these due to the instability of the economy/market.
However, he managed to turn all these around by having a multi-million dollar online business in 4 years! He is now making a 6-figure monthly income through 'Crowd Commerce'.
He now goes around (traveling all over the world) sharing and empowering others to do the same.
Winston will be sharing on:
1. How do you build a truly global eCommerce business without breaking the bank2. Evolution of eCommerce (where it is heading and how can you leverage on it ahead of time)3. How to achieve more than US$40 Million in online sales revenue in 53 countries online without investing in hosting, website design, autoresponder, apps, inventory, delivery, or paying fees to Amazon, Qoo10, Lazada, Shopify, etc. 4. Discover an almost unknown disruptive eCommerce model that is more powerful than Alibaba, TaoBao, Amazon or even WeChat5. And much more...
Join us in this workshop to experience this revolutionary E-Commerce Business platform.
RSVP today to secure your passport to achieving sustainable life-long income!
#entrepreneur #startups #networking #workfromhome #passiveincome #extraincome #residualincome #sustainable #ecommerce #online #homepreneur

events.name: Test Automation Summit Singapore 2018
events.description: Emerging Test Automation and Digital influence in QA: Trends, Innovations and Challenges Testingmind cordially invites you to attend, “Test Automation and Digital QA Summit 2018”, a single day, single track event which will be held near you. Join us for this event where we celebrate Quality Assurance learnings from proven Industry leaders and practitioners. The Summit showcases the trends, innovations and challenges in the emerging world of Software Automation Testing. Apart from the engaging sessions on Test Automation and Digital Assurance do savour an opportunity to network with peers and practitioners over lunch and during networking breaks to exchange ideas and extend your connectivity across organization. The event features an inspiring day of talks by professional speakers focused on Test Automation innovation and influence of Digital trends in Quality Assurance. Quality Assurance Leadership, Management and Strategy converge here to bring out Industry best practices and is a key meeting place for Test Professionals and Executives from leading IT organizations. Topics of Agenda -Testing Today’s Applications in Digital world: Tools you can use -Integrating Automated Testing into DevOps and Agile -Service Virtualization Testing: The Challenges you need to overcome -How effective is your Test Automation Scripting? -Test Automation in Digital World – Leveraging Analytics and Intelligent Testing -Testing Today’s Application – Test Automation Tools you can use -Setting up Effective and Scalable Test Automation Environments -Mobility Assurance through Automation -Digital Transformation in Quality Assurance – Following the Change in QA -Automating Load and Performance Testing For Speakers, agenda or Registration, please visit our website:https://www.testingmind.com/event/test-automation-summit-singapore-2018/ Please Note:This is not a free event and registration is required for this event. The registration can be done through our website.
events.group_name: Agile Testing, Test Automation and BDD, Singapore
